questions.question: The process by which you become aware of messages through your sense is called?

answers.a: a cognitive bias that makes us listen only to information we already agree with
answers.b: a method teachers use to reward good listeners in the classroom
answers.c: any factor that gets in the way of good listening and decreases our ability to interpret correctly
answers.d: a response that allows you to state your interpretation and ask your partner whether or not that interpretation is correct
